chain.name: POLLUTED! <1-Evil Eye> (Part 1)
procedures: Talk to Wanted: Evil Eye in Dungeon: Cave of Evil Eye I.
Eliminate 99 Evil Eye.
Talk to The Rememberer in Sleepywood.
chain.npcLocation: Dungeon: Cave of Evil Eye I

chain.name: POLLUTED! <1-Evil Eye> (Part 2)
procedures: Talk to Wanted: Evil Eye in Dungeon: Cave of Evil Eye I.
Eliminate 999 Evil Eye.
Talk to The Rememberer in Sleepywood.
chain.npcLocation: Dungeon: Cave of Evil Eye I

chain.name: Mrs. Ming Ming's Second Worry
procedures: Talk to Mrs. Ming Ming in Henesys.

chain.name: Estelle's Request
procedures: Talk to Mrs. Ming Ming in Henesys.
Talk to Estelle in Victoria Road: The Field South of Ellinia.
Estelle will give you Estelle's Special Sauce.

chain.name: Estelle's Special Sauce
procedures: Talk to Mrs. Ming Ming in Henesys.
Hunt for 15 Pig's Head from Pig.
Hunt for 60 Octopus Leg from Octopus.
Return to Mrs. Ming Ming once you have collected the necessary items.

chain.name: Research on Plant Fossils
procedures: Talk to Betty in Ellinia.
Collect 20 Plant Sample.
Return to Betty once you have collected the necessary items.

chain.name: Progress on Fossil Research
procedures: Talk to Betty in Ellinia.
Hunt for 100 Leaf.
Hunt for 50 Firewood.
Hunt for Stump's Teardrop from Dark Axe Stump.
Collect Weighted Earrings.
Talk to Winston in Victoria Road: East Rocky Mountain II.

name: Dr. Betty's Research on Animal Fossils

chain.name: Research on Animal Fossils
procedures: Talk to Anne in Victoria Road: The Hill East of Henesys.
Answer several questions correctly.
Anne will give you Stuffed Drake Skull.
chain.npcLocation: Victoria Road: The Hill East of Henesys

chain.name: Transporting Drake's Skull
procedures: Talk to Betty in Ellinia.

chain.name: DANGER! <3-Z. Mushroom> (Part 1)
procedures: Talk to Wanted: Z. Mushroom in Dungeon: Cave of Evil Eye I.
Eliminate 99 Zombie Mushroom.
Talk to The Rememberer in Sleepywood.

chain.name: DANGER! <3-Z. Mushroom> (Part 2)                      repeatable
procedures: Talk to Wanted: Z. Mushroom in Dungeon: Cave of Evil Eye I.
Eliminate 999 Zombie Mushroom.
Talk to The Rememberer in Sleepywood.

name: A Way to Fight Off Sleep

chain.name: A Way to Fight Off Sleep
procedures: Talk to Mike in Warning Street: Perion Dungeon Entrance.
Collect 1 Red Potion.
Collect 1 Orange Potion.
Collect 1 White Potion.
Collect 1 Blue Potion.
Return to Mike once you have completed the task.

chain.name: Camila's Gem
rewards: Utah's Pig Farm may only be reached when this quest is initiated.
procedures: Talk to Camila in Henesys.
You will obtain 1 Sparkling Glass Marble.
Locate the portal to Hidden Street: Utah's Pig Farm at the top left of Victoria Road: The Forest East of Henesys map.
Jump on the hay bales and press up until you reach Utah at the other side of the map.
Talk to Utah and give him the Sparkling Glass Marble.

chain.name: Horny Mushroom Caps Research
rewards: This quest cannot be started after level 34.
procedures: Talk to The Rememberer.
Gather 30 Horny Mushroom Cap and give them to The Rememberer.

chain.name: Raging Horny Mushrooms
procedures: Talk to The Rememberer.
Defeat 80 Horny Mushroom.
Talk to The Rememberer again.

chain.name: Understanding the Horny Mushroom Signals
procedures: Talk to The Rememberer.
Gather 20 Tainted Horny Mushroom Cap and bring them to The Rememberer.

chain.name: Zombie Mushroom Signal 1
procedures: Talk to The Rememberer.
Defeat 80 Zombie Mushroom.
Talk to The Rememberer again.

chain.name: Zombie Mushroom Signal 2
procedures: Talk to The Rememberer.
Gather 100 The Charm of the Undead and give them to The Rememberer.

chain.name: Zombie Mushroom Signal 3
procedures: Talk to The Rememberer.
Gather 20 Recording Charm and bring them to The Rememberer.

chain.name: Dr. Faymus' Request             (Level 25 and above)
procedures: Talk to Nella outside the Hairshop in Kerning City.
Hunt for 100 Horny Mushroom Cap.
Hunt for 50 Jr. Necki's Skin.
Return to Nella after hunting the items and talk to her repeatedly until you receive the next request.

chain.name: Chris' Request             (Level 25 and above)
procedures: Talk to Nella outside the Hairshop in Kerning City.
Hunt for 20 Leather.
Hunt for 50 Stiff Feather.
Return to Nella after hunting the items and talk to her repeatedly until you receive the next request.

chain.name: Cutthroat Manny's Request             (Level 25 and above)
rewards: Blue Sneakers x 1 if you are a Beginner
Emerald Battle Grieves x 1 if you are a Warrior
White Magicshoes x 1 if you are a Magician
Green Hunter Boots x 1 if you are a Bowman
Silver Chain Boots x 1 if you are a Thief
Brown Paulie Boots x 1 if you are a Pirate
procedures: Talk to Nella outside the Hairshop in Kerning City.
Hunt for 200 Evil Eye's Tail.
Return to Nella after hunting the items and talk to her.

chain.name: Stranger's Request             (Level 25 and above)
procedures: Talk to Jane Doe at Niora Hospital in Kerning City.
Collect 20 Broken Mirror Glass from Wild Boar.
Return to Jane Doe and give her the collected items.

chain.name: Stranger's Identity             (Level 25 and above)
procedures: Jane Doe will ask you to help her once more by collecting 100 The Charm of the Undead.
Once you have collected them, go back to Jane Doe and give her the item.

chain.name: Sabitrama and the Diet Medicine
rewards: Scroll for Overall Armor for DEF 60% x 1
Scroll for Overall Armor for DEF 10% x 1
procedures: Talk to Sabitrama in Sleepywood.
Talk to Shane of Ellinia (near the top).
Climb step 1 and 2 of the Forest of Patience.
Click on the flower and you will obtain 1 Pink Anthurium.
Return to Sabitrama.

chain.name: Find the Maple History Book
procedures: Talk to Jay in Henesys.
Hunt for 1 Maple History Book I by breaking the box in the airship to Ossyria.
Hunt for 1 Maple History Book II by breaking the box in the Magic Library in Ellinia.
Head over to Ludibrium and hunt for 1 Maple History Book III from Chronos.
Go to Ludibrium: Eos Tower Entrance and talk to Tigun the Advisor.

chain.name: Shawn the Excavator's Request
procedures: Talk to Winston at Victoria Road: East Rocky Mountain II.
Hunt for 5 Wooden Board from Wooden Mask.
Hunt for 5 Slate from Rocky Mask.
Return to Winston and give him the collected items.
chain.npcLocation: Victoria Road: East Rocky Mountain II

chain.name: Lazy Little Calico
procedures: Talk to Bartol in The Nautilus: Mid Floor - Hallway.
Hunt for 10 Evil Eye's Tail.
Once you have collected the items, look for Calico in The Nautilus: Mid Floor - Hallway and talk to him.

chain.name: Jane and the Wild Boar
rewards: Scroll for Bow for ATT 60% x 1
Scroll for Claw for ATT 60% x 1
Scroll for Crossbow for ATT 60% x 1
Scroll for Dagger for ATT 60% x 1
Scroll for Gun for Attack 60% x 1
Scroll for One-Handed Sword for ATT 60% x 1
Scroll for One-Handed Axe for ATT 60% x 1
Scroll for One-Handed BW for ATT 60% x 1
Scroll for Pole Arm for ATT 60% x 1
Scroll for Spear for ATT 60% x 1
Scroll for Staff for Magic Attack 60% x 1
Scroll for Two-Handed Sword for ATT 60% x 1
Scroll for Two-Handed Axe for ATT 60% x 1
Scroll for Two-Handed BW for ATT 60% x 1
Scroll for Wand for Magic Attack 60% x 1
Scroll for Knuckler for ATT 60% x 1
procedures: Talk to Jane in Lith Harbor.
Hunt for 100 Horny Mushroom Cap from Horny Mushroom.
Hunt for 80 Wild Boar's Tooth from Wild Boar.
Return to Jane once you have collected the necessary items.

chain.name: Arwen and the Glass Shoes
rewards: *Arwen's Glass Shoes is a RARE item.
procedures: Talk to Arwen the Fairy in Ellinia.
Select the "I heard you lost a pair of Glass Shoes" option.
Hunt Fire Boar around Perion for Arwen's Glass Shoes*.
Return the Arwen's Glass Shoes to Arwen the Fairy.

chain.name: Karcasa of the Desert
procedures: Talk to The Rememberer.
Talk to Karcasa.

chain.name: Mr. Lim and the Subway
rewards: This quest is only available until 1st January 2009.
This quest can only be started while level 30 or under.
procedures: Click the lightbulb above your head to talk to Jake.
Talk to Mr. Lim.

chain.name: Eliminate Monsters from the Site
rewards: Scroll for Shoes for Speed 60% x 1
Scroll for Shoes for Jump 60% x 1
procedures: Talk to Winston at Victoria Road: East Rocky Mountain II.
Kill 200 Wooden Mask.
Kill 300 Rocky Mask.
Return to Winston once you have completed the task.
chain.npcLocation: Victoria Road: East Rocky Mountain II

chain.name: How to Avoid the Stink
procedures: Talk to The Rememberer in Sleepywood.
Collect 30 Wild Boar Leathers from Wild Boars.
Collect 30 The Charm of the Undeads from Zombie Mushrooms.
Collect 30 Evil Eye Eyeballs from Evil Eyes.
Return to The Rememberer in Sleepywood.

chain.name: The Rememberer's Training-3
procedures: Talk to The Rememberer in Sleepywood.
Kill 50 Evil Eyes.
Return to The Rememberer in Sleepywood.

chain.name: The Rememberer's Training-2
procedures: Talk to The Rememberer in Sleepywood.
Kill 50 Zombie Mushrooms.
Return to The Rememberer in Sleepywood.

chain.name: The Rememberer's Training-1
procedures: Talk to The Rememberer in Sleepywood.
Kill 50 Horny Mushrooms.
Return to The Rememberer in Sleepywood.

chain.name: Secret of Astaroth
procedures: Talk to The Rememberer in Sleepywood.

name: For the Peace of Victoria Island...

chain.name: Black Bark's Worry             (Level 30 and above)
procedures: Talk to Black Bark in The Nautilus: Conference Room.
Hunt for 40 Tablecloth from Jr. Wraith.
Go to Henesys and give the collected items to Mrs. Ming Ming.

chain.name: Dress for Kyrin             (Level 30 and above)
procedures: Talk to Mrs. Ming Ming in Henesys and you will obtain 1 Dress.
Head over to The Nautilus: Conference Room and give the obtained item to Black Bark.

chain.name: Bartol's Request (Part I)
procedures: Look for Bartol in The Nautilus: Mid Floor - Hallway and talk to him.

chain.name: Bring a Lemon for Shulynch
procedures: Talk to Bartol.
Obtain 1 Lemon.
Look for Shulynch in The Nautilus: Training Room and talk to her.

chain.name: Take the Gold Pouch to Muirhat
procedures: Talk to Bartol and you will obtain 1 Gold Pouch.
Look for Muirhat in The Nautilus: Top Floor - Hallway and talk to him.

chain.name: Deliver the Tattered Map to Black Bark
procedures: Talk to Bartol and you will obtain 1 Tattered Map.
Look for Black Bark in The Nautilus: Conference Room and talk to him.

chain.name: Bartol's Request (Part II)
procedures: Return to Bartol and talk to him.

chain.name: Information for Dr. Kim
procedures: Talk to Rolonay in The Nautilus: Mid Floor - Hallway and you will obtain 1 Rolonay's Research Report.
Head over to Omega Sector: Command Center and look for Dr. Kim.

chain.name: A Hole in the Nautilus
procedures: Talk to Bonnie in The Nautilus: Bottom Floor - Hallway.
Hunt for 50 Solid Horn from Jr. Cellion, Jr. Grupin or Jr. Lioner.
Return to Bonnie after you have collected the items.

chain.name: Shumi's Lost Bundle of Money
rewards:
Random Reward(s) (if quest is repeated):

Emerald Ore
Garnet Ore
Opal Ore
procedures: Talk to Shumi in Kerning City.
Purchase 1 Jake from Jake in the Victoria Road: Subway Ticketing Booth.
Double click The Ticket Gate to enter Construction Site B2.
Complete steps 1 and 2 of Construction Site B2.
Get Shumi's Roll of Cash from the chest by double clicking it.
Return it to Shumi.

chain.name: Building a New House For "Blackbull"
rewards: Scroll for One-Handed Sword for ATT 10% x 1 if you are a Warrior
Scroll for One-Handed Axe for ATT 10% x 1 if you are a Warrior
Scroll for One-Handed BW for ATT 10% x 1 if you are a Warrior
Scroll for Two-Handed Sword for ATT 10% x 1 if you are a Warrior
Scroll for Two-Handed Axe for ATT 10% x 1 if you are a Warrior
Scroll for Two-Handed BW for ATT 10% x 1 if you are a Warrior
Scroll for Spear for ATT 10% x 1 if you are a Warrior
Scroll for Pole Arm for ATT 10% x 1 if you are a Warrior
Scroll for Wand for Magic Attack 10% x 1 if you are a Magician
Scroll for Staff for Magic Attack 10% x 1 if you are a Magician
Scroll for Bow for ATT 10% x 1 if you are a Bowman
Scroll for Crossbow for ATT 10% x 1 if you are a Bowman
Scroll for Dagger for ATT 10% x 1 if you are a Thief
Scroll for Claw for ATT 10% x 1 if you are a Thief
Scroll for Gun for ATT 10% x 1 if you are a Pirate
Scroll for Knuckler for ATT 10% x 1 if you are a Pirate
procedures: Talk to Blackbull in Perion.
Hunt 100 Stone Golem Rubble from Stone Golem.
Collect 30 Processed Wood.
Collect 30 Screw.
Hunt "Blackbull's" deed to the land from Curse Eye.
Return to Blackbull with those items.

chain.name: The Test
procedures: Click the lightbulb above your head to talk to Head Security Officer.
Gather 50 Mutated Spore and bring them to Head Security Officer.

chain.name: The Story Behind the Case
procedures: Talk to Head Security Officer.
Talk to Secretary of Domestic Affairs.

chain.name: Exploring Mushroom Forest (1)
procedures: Talk to Secretary of Domestic Affairs.
Investigate the magic barrier to the east.
Talk to Secretary of Domestic Affairs again.

chain.name: Exploring Mushroom Forest (3)
procedures: Talk to Secretary of Magic.
Talk to Scarrs.

chain.name: Killer Mushroom Spores (2)
procedures: Talk to Scarrs.
Gather 50 Mutated Spore and bring them to Scarrs.

chain.name: Killer Mushroom Spores (3)
procedures: Talk to Scarrs to get Killer Mushroom Spore Sample from him.
Bring the Killer Mushroom Spore Sample to Secretary of Magic.

chain.name: Friendship with Bruce
procedures: Talk to Scarrs to get Killer Mushroom Spore Sample from him.
Bring the Killer Mushroom Spore Sample to Bruce.

chain.name: Over the Castle Walls (2)
procedures: Talk to Secretary of Domestic Affairs.
Investigate the Mushroom Castle.
Talk to Secretary of Domestic Affairs again.

chain.name: Over the Castle Walls (3)
procedures: Talk to Secretary of Domestic Affairs.
Gather 100 Intoxicated Pig Tail and bring them to Secretary of Magic.

chain.name: Over the Castle Walls (4)
procedures: Talk to Secretary of Magic to get the Thorn Remover from him.
Use the Thorn Remover on the Mushroom Castle walls.
Talk to Secretary of Magic again.

chain.name: Killer Mushroom Spores (1)
procedures: Talk to Scarrs.
Gather 100 Poison Mushroom Cap and bring them to Scarrs.

chain.name: James's Whereabouts (1)
procedures: Talk to Head Security Officer.
Talk to James.

chain.name: James's Whereabouts (2)
procedures: Talk to James.
Gather a Helmet Pepe's Helmet and bring it to James.

chain.name: James's Whereabouts (3)
procedures: Talk to James.

chain.name: Stop the Wedding
procedures: Talk to Mushking.
Defeat Grey Yeti and King Pepe, Gold Yeti and King Pepe, and White Yeti and King Pepe.
Talk to Mushking again.

chain.name: The Seal of the Empire
procedures: Talk to Secretary of Domestic Affairs.
Defeat the Prime Minister to get The Royal Seal of the Mushking Empire.
Talk to Secretary of Domestic Affairs again.

itemsNeeded.name: The Royal Seal of the Mushking Empire

chain.name: Where's Violetta?
procedures: Find the Wedding Hall Key.
Find Violetta.

chain.name: The Story of Betrayal
procedures: Talk to Violetta.
Defeat Prime Minister.
Talk to Violetta again.

chain.name: The Identity of the Princess
procedures: Talk to Violetta.

chain.name: Eliminating the Rest
procedures: Talk to Violetta.

chain.name: Endangered Mushking Empire
procedures: Speak to your Job Instructor and acquire the Recommendation Letter - Job Instructor.
Head over to Mushroom Castle: Mushroom Forest Field.
Speak to Head Security Officer to hand over the Inkwell.

chain.name: John's Present
rewards: Work Gloves x 1 if you are a Beginner
Dark Briggon x 1 if you are a Warrior
Dark Noel x 1 if you are a Magician
Gold Scaler x 1 if you are a Bowman
Gold Arbion x 1 if you are a Thief
Brown Jeweled x 1 if you are a Pirate

Random Reward(s) (if quest is repeated):

Aquamarine Ore
Garnet Ore
Topaz Ore
procedures: Talk to John in Lith Harbor.
Go to Sleepywood and touch the Mysterious Statue.
Complete steps 3 and 4 of Deep Forest of Patience and collect the Blue Viola.
Return to John to hand him the Blue Viola.

rewards: Scroll for One-Handed Sword for ATT 60% x 1 if you are a Warrior
Scroll for One-Handed Axe for ATT 60% x 1 if you are a Warrior
Scroll for One-Handed BW for ATT 60% x 1 if you are a Warrior
Scroll for Two-Handed Sword for ATT 60% x 1 if you are a Warrior
Scroll for Two-Handed Axe for ATT 60% x 1 if you are a Warrior

Scroll for Claw for ATT 60% x 1 if you are a Thief
Scroll for Knuckler for ATT 60% x 1 if you are a Pirate
Scroll for Gun for Attack 60% x 1 if you are a Pirate
procedures: Search for Wanted: Curse Eye signboard in Dungeon: Hunting Ground in the Deep Forest II.
Kill 99 Curse Eye.

rewards: Scroll for Cape for INT 60% x 1
Scroll for Cape for DEX 60% x 1
Scroll for Cape for LUK 60% x 1
Scroll for Cape for STR 60% x 1
Scroll for One-Handed Sword for ATT 100% x 1 if you are a Warrior

Scroll for Dagger for ATT 60% x 1 if you are a Thief

Scroll for Knuckler for ATT 60% x 1 if you are a Pirate
Scroll for Gun for Attack 60% x 1 if you are a Pirate
procedures: Search for Wanted: Curse Eye signboard in Dungeon: Hunting Ground in the Deep Forest II again.
Kill 999 Curse Eye.
Return to Sleepywood and talk to The Rememberer once you have completed the task for Part II.
chain.npcLocation: Dungeon: Hunting Ground in the Deep Forest II

chain.name: What the Mama Monkey Stole
rewards: This quest is repeatable every 60 minutes.
procedures: Talk to Ritaya.
Talk to Dao and enter in Mini Dungeon : Monkey Temple 2. You must have a Golden Ticket or Premium Golden Ticket with you to enter.
Hunt Mama Monkey and collect 5 Ritaya's Camera and 5 Ritaya's Cell Phone.
Return to Ritaya and talk to her.

chain.name: Read the Newspaper!
rewards: Dark Scroll for Overall Armor for DEX 30% x 1
procedures: Talk to Tsuri in Zipangu: Showa Town.
Obtain 1 Newspaper Hat.
Go back to Tsuri and give him the collected item.

name: White Baby Monkey Making a Mess of the Garden

chain.name: Dancer's Ringing
procedures: Talk to Sirin in Ariant: The Town of Ariant.
Hunt for 20 Snake Rattle from Bellamoa.
Return to her after you have collected the items.

chain.name: The Problems with Life Alchemy
procedures: Talk to Bedin at Zenumist Research Institute: Lab - 1st Floor Hallway in Sunset Road: Magatia.
Eliminate 150 Sand Rat.
Return to Bedin and talk to him.
chain.npcLocation: Zenumist Research Institute: Lab - 1st Floor Hallway

name: A Request from a Member of the Sand Bandits!

chain.name: A Request from a Member of the Sand Bandits! 1
procedures: Talk to Strange Guy in The Burning Sands: The Scorching Desert.
Hunt for 30 Cactus Stem from Jr. Cactus.
Return to him after you have collected the item.
chain.npcLocation: The Burning Sands: The Scorching Desert

chain.name: A Request from a Member of the Sand Bandits! 2
procedures: Talk to Strange Guy in The Burning Sands: The Scorching Desert.
Hunt for 50 Cactus Thorn from Cactus.
Return to him after you have collected the item.

chain.name: A Request from a Member of the Sand Bandits! 3
procedures: Talk to Strange Guy in The Burning Sands: The Scorching Desert.
Head over to Ariant Castle.

Once you enter the castle, quickly make your way to Ariant Castle: King's Room through the hidden portals. (Tips: As you are walking towards the King's Room, keep pressing the Up arrow all the way to access the hidden portal on the maps).
Head towards the most right part of the map and double click on the drawer, as shown in the image below to obtain 1 Queen's Ring.
chain.npcLocation: The Burning Sands: The Scorching Desert

chain.name: Sirin Speaks
procedures: Talk to Strange Guy in The Burning Sands: The Scorching Desert.
Go to Ariant: The Town of Ariant and talk to Sirin.

chain.name: True or False
procedures: Talk to Sirin in Ariant: The Town of Ariant.
Talk to her once again.

chain.name: Screwing the Red Scorpions
procedures: Go back to The Burning Sands: The Scorching Desert and access to the hidden portal as shown in the image below.
Enter the door in the middle of the map and type in the secret password: Open Sesame.
Talk to the Treasure Box and you will obtain 4 Small Treasure Pouch.
Go to Ariant: The Town of Ariant and enter the houses that has the circle marked on the doors as shown in the image above.

Talk to the hidden NPCs in their houses respectively to drop the 1 Small Treasure Pouch, as shown in the following images:

Residential Area 1

Residential Area 2

Residential Area 4

Residential Area 6
Once you have completed the tasks, talk to Sirin to complete the quest

name: A Proper Reward for a Good Deed

chain.name: A Proper Reward for a Good Deed
procedures: Talk to Sirin in Ariant: The Town of Ariant.
Head over to The Burning Sands: The Scorching Desert and access the hidden portal as shown in the image above.
Enter the door in the middle of the map and type in the secret password: Open Sesame.
Talk to Treasure Box to complete the quest.

chain.name: Jiyur's Sister
procedures: Talk to Jiyur in Ariant: The Town of Ariant.
Head to Ariant Castle: King's Room and talk to Schegerazade.

chain.name: A Letter From The Sister
procedures: Go to Ariant: The Town of Ariant and pass 1 Scheherazade’s Letter to Jiyur.

chain.name: A Present For His Sister
procedures: Talk to Jiyur in Ariant: The Town of Ariant.
Hunt for 20 Cactus Flower.
Go to Ariant Castle: King's Room and give the collected items to Schegerazade.

name: First Mission of the Sand Bandits

chain.name: First Mission
procedures: Talk to Jano in the secret house located at the most right of the map in Ariant: The Town of Ariant.
Head over to Ariant: Ariant Castle and talk to Tigun to initiate another quest, Tigun's Hair.
After obtaining 1 Tigun's Beard Strand, head back to Jano and talk to him.

chain.name: Mission Complete!
rewards: Scroll for Shoes for DEX 60% x 1
procedures: Talk to Jano once again and you will obtain 1 Tigun's Transformation Remedy.
Head over to The Burning Sands: Tent of the Entertainers.
Use 1 Tigun's Transformation Remedy to transform into Tigun and then talk to Karcasa. If you cannot obtain 1 Silk Ordered by the Queen from Karcasa, talk to him once again.
Use a Return Scroll - Nearest Town scroll to get back to The Burning Road: Ariant without getting hit, as getting hit by any monster will cancel the transformation.
Return to Jano and talk to him.

name: The Existence of the Secret Organization

chain.name: The Existence of the Secret Organization
procedures: Talk to Sirin in Ariant: The Town of Ariant.
Talk to the hidden NPC, as shown in the image above.
Return to Sirin and talk to her.
Answer the question asked by her.

name: The True Identity of Sand Bandits

chain.name: The True Identity of Sand Bandits
procedures: Talk to Jano in a secret house, located in Ariant: The Town of Ariant at the very far right of the map, as shown in the image below.

chain.name: Tigun's Hair
rewards: If you used Tigun's Transformation Remedy too early, touched a monster and turned back into your character again, just forfeit the quest and talk to Tigun once again to obtain the rewarded item.
procedures: Hunt for 1 Lidium Ore.
Return to Tigun once you have collected the item.

chain.name: Test from the Head of Zenumist Society
procedures: Talk to Han the Broker in Sunset Road: Magatia.
Prepare any two jewel ores and talk to him again.

chain.name: Zenumist Cape
procedures: Talk to Han the Broker in Sunset Road: Magatia and you will receive 1 Strange Bottle of Water from him.
Go to Magatia: Zenumist Society, and drop the Strange Bottle of Water next to the green alchemy pillar.
A Regular Tree Branch will be created as a result, so give it to Carson.

chain.name: Test from the Head of Alcadno Society
procedures: Talk to Han the Broker in Sunset Road: Magatia.
Prepare any two jewel ores and talk to him again.

chain.name: Alcadno Cape
procedures: Talk to Han the Broker in Sunset Road: Magatia, and you will acquire the Anonymous Research Report from him.
Go to Magatia: Alcadno Society, and bring the item to Maed.

Answer Maed's questions with the following answer (in order):

Alcando is always looking for ways to turn machines into a form of life. These efforts have yielded multiple forms of mechanical dolls, ready to be tested. Dolls like Roid, Neo Huroid, etc... Here's the question... which ore is used as the source of power? Lidium
Machine dolls that use Lidium as the source of energy can be controlled by the Magic Pentagram. In order to make the basic equation that allows the Pentagram to control the movements of the machine dolls, then what would be the best book to use for this? Grendel the Really Old
Name this great alchemist who created the 1st Magic Rock of its kind, who also built the foundation for the Flying Ship, as well as proving the extent of the effect Mana provides on life. He was also the 3rd president of the Magatia Alchemy Society... Alcaster

Alcando is always looking for ways to turn machines into a form of life. These efforts have yielded multiple forms of mechanical dolls, ready to be tested. Dolls like Roid, Neo Huroid, etc... Here's the question... which ore is used as the source of power? Lidium

Machine dolls that use Lidium as the source of energy can be controlled by the Magic Pentagram. In order to make the basic equation that allows the Pentagram to control the movements of the machine dolls, then what would be the best book to use for this? Grendel the Really Old

Name this great alchemist who created the 1st Magic Rock of its kind, who also built the foundation for the Flying Ship, as well as proving the extent of the effect Mana provides on life. He was also the 3rd president of the Magatia Alchemy Society... Alcaster
Once you answer all the questions correctly, you will receive the Alcadno's Cape.

chain.name: Byron's Recommendation Letter
rewards: This quest only applies to First Job Advancement.
procedures: Talk to Byron in Ariant: The Town of Ariant and you will receive 1 Byron's Recommendation [1].
Head over to Victoria Island and talk to your respective first job instructor.

chain.name: A Deal with the Broker
procedures: Talk to Han the Broker in Sunset Road: Magatia.
Pay him 10,000 mesos and listen to his story behind Magatia and the two factions.

chain.name: Re-acquiring Zenumist Cape
procedures: Talk to Carson at Magatia: Zenumist Society in Sunset Road: Magatia.
Hunt for 10 Leather, gather 5 Emerald and 10,000 mesos and pass them to Carson.

chain.name: Re-acquiring Alcadno Cape
procedures: Talk to Maed at Magatia: Alcadno Society in Sunset Road: Magatia.
Hunt for 10 Leather, gather 5 Topaz and 10,000 mesos and pass them to Maed.

chain.name: The Girl Who Lost Her Memory             (Level 25 and above)
procedures: Talk to Korin in Ludibrium: Ludibrium Village.  She will be inside one of the houses.
Head to Omega Sector and talk to Agent Marco.

chain.name: The Man In The Black Suit             (Level 25 and above)
procedures: Hunt for 5 Piece of Memory from Mateon.
Give the collected item to Agent Marco.

chain.name: The Recovered Memory             (Level 25 and above)
rewards: Scroll for Helmet for DEF 60% x 1
procedures: Return to Korin and give her the obtained item.

chain.name: Toy Soldier's Walnut
rewards: Silver Battle Grieves x 1 if you are a Warrior
Blue Magicshoes x 1 if you are a Magician
Green Hunter Boots x 1 if you are a Bowman
Iron Chain Boots x 1 if you are a Thief
Brown Paulie Boots x 1 if you are a Pirate
procedures: Talk to Delv the Toy Soldier in Ludibrium: Eos Tower 100th Floor
Collect 20 Tasty Walnut by hunting Black Ratz.
Return to Delv the Toy Soldier and give him the collected items.

chain.name: Dollhouse
procedures: Talk to Delv the Toy Soldier  in Ludibrium: Eos Tower 100th Floor
Next, talk to Olson the Toy Soldier.
You will be brought to a tower.
Search around the tower for the real Dollhouse.  The real Dollhouse has a slightly-3D handle compared to the fake Dollhouse.
Once you have found the real Dollhouse, hit the door and 1 Pendulum will drop out.
Talk to Mark the Toy Soldier and you will be brought out of the room.

chain.name: Nemi's Dilemma
rewards: Jousting Helmet x 1 if you are a Warrior
Green Jester x 1 if you are a Magician
Green Hawkeye x 1 if you are a Bowman
Brown Guise x 1 if you are a Thief
White Oceania Cap x 1 if you are a Pirate
procedures: Talk to Nemi in Ludibrium: Ludibrium Village.  She will be inside one of the houses.
Hunt for 45 Rat Trap.
Go back to Nemi and give her the collected item.

chain.name: Roly-Poly 6's Tool
procedures: Talk to Roly-Poly 6, located at Ludibrium: Eos Tower 46th ~ 55th Floor.
Collect 1 Screwdriver by hunting Bloctopus.
Return to Roly-Poly 6 and give the item to him.

chain.name: Nemi's Lunchbox Delivery
procedures: Talk to Nemi in Ludibrium: Ludibrium Village. She will be inside one of the houses.  You will obtain 1 Nemi's Lunch Box.
Head over to Manager Karl in Ludibrium: Toy Factory <Main Process 1> and pass him the item.

chain.name: Nemi's Second Ingredient
procedures: Talk to Nemi in Ludibrium: Ludibrium Village.  She will be inside one of the houses.
Hunt for 15 Small Egg from Tweeter.
Return to Nemi and give her the collected items.

chain.name: Dr. Kim's Comments : Blueprint for New Robot
procedures: Talk to Dr. Kim  in Omega Sector: Command Center and you will obtain 1 Blueprint Machine.
Look for Chury in Omega Sector: Silo and talk to him.

chain.name: Dr. Kim's Comments : A Meeting With Chury
procedures: Search for Hoony in Omega Sector: Boswell Field III and talk to him.
Hunt for 20 Space Food.
Return to Hoony and give him the collected item.

chain.name: Dr. Kim's Comments : A Meeting With Hoony
procedures: Search for Gunny in Omega Sector: Boswell Field V and give him the obtained item.

chain.name: Dr. Kim's Comments : A Meeting With Gunny
procedures: Finally, return to Dr. Kim and talk to him.

chain.name: An Important Robotic Part
procedures: Talk to Dr. Kim  in Omega Sector: Command Center.
Head over to Ludibrium: Toy Factory <Process 1> Zone 1 and talk to Assistant Cheng.

chain.name: Delivering The Robotic Parts
procedures: Return to Dr. Kim  and give him the obtained items.

chain.name: Help Kevin The Soldier's Vacation Plans
procedures: Talk to Kevin the Soldier in Omega Sector.
Hunt for 30 Mateon's Tentacle.
Hunt for 1 Ripped Travel Ticket 1  from Mateon.
Go back to Kevin the Soldier and give him the collected items.

chain.name: A Chat With Nana The Tour Guide
procedures: Look for Nara in Ludibrium and talk to her.
Next, head over to Orbis and talk to Shuri.

chain.name: Recovering VIP Ticket To Florina Beach
rewards: VIP Ticket to Florina Beach x 1
procedures: Obtain 3 Diamond.
Hunt for 50 Star Pixie's Starpiece.
Hunt for 30 Lunar Pixie's Moonpiece.
Return to Shuri and give her all the collected items.

chain.name: The Missing Mechanical Parts
rewards: Scroll for Shoes for Jump 60% x 1
Scroll for Shoes for Jump 10% x 1
Scroll for Shoes for Speed 60% x 1
Scroll for Shoes for Speed 10% x 1
procedures: Talk to Assistant Cheng in Ludibrium: Toy Factory <Process 1> Zone 1.
Collect 10 Mechanical Parts by attempting a jump quest.
Give the collected items to Assistant Cheng once you have completed the task.

chain.name: Cleaning Up Eos Tower
procedures: Talk to Marcel in Ludibrium.
Eliminate 50 Ratz.
Go back to Marcel and talk to him.

chain.name: The Lost Guard
procedures: Talk to Lost Soldier in Ludibrium: Eos Tower 93rd Floor.
Hunt for 15 Propeller from Helly.
Hunt for 15 Worn-Out Goggle from Chirppy.
Return to Lost Soldier and give him all the collected items.

chain.name: Retrieving the Robotic Parts
procedures: Talk to Dr. Kim in Omega Sector: Command Center.
Head over to Hidden Street: Plateon Field and hit the Electrical Machine to obtain 1 Box of Parts #1.
Next, go to Hidden Street: Mecateon Field and hit the Electrical Machine to obtain 1 Box of Parts #2.
Lastly, go to Hidden Street: Mateon Field and hit the Electrical Machine to obtain 1 Box of Parts #3.
Return to Dr. Kim once you have collected the items.

name: Cleaning Up the Inner Parts of Eos Tower
Cleaning Up the Outer Parts of Eos Tower

chain.name: Cleaning Up the Outer Parts of Eos Tower
procedures: Talk to Marcel in Ludibrium.
Eliminate 30 Propelly.
Eliminate 30 Tweeter.
Go back to Marcel and talk to him.

chain.name: Angie's Beloved Costume 1
procedures: Talk to Angie in Singapore: CBD.
Hunt for 20 Leather.
Hunt for 20 Tablecloth.
Go back to Angie once you have completed the task.

chain.name: Angie's Beloved Costume 2
procedures: Talk to Angie in Singapore: CBD.
Hunt for 25 Leather.
Hunt for 25 Tablecloth.
Collect 5 Emerald.
Go back to Angie once you have completed the task.

chain.name: Angie's Beloved Costume 3
rewards: Scroll for Wand for Magic Attack 10% x 1
procedures: Talk to Angie in Singapore: CBD.
Hunt for 50 Leather.
Hunt for 50 Tablecloth.
Collect 10 Emerald.
Go back to Angie once you have completed the task.

chain.name: Stop the Speeder!
rewards: Scroll for Wand for Magic Attack 60% x 1
procedures: Talk to Adrian in Singapore: CBD.
Hunt for 100 Speed Limit Sign.
Hunt for 100 Metal Pole.
Return to Adrian once you have collected the items.

chain.name: Spiruna's Prophecy
procedures: Find Spiruna inside Old Man's House at Orbis: Cloud Park IV and talk to her.

chain.name: Lightening Up Orbis
procedures: Talk to ???? in Old Man's House.
Kill 100 Jr. Cellion.
Kill 100 Jr. Lioner.
Kill 100 Jr. Grupin.
Return to ???? once you have completed the tasks.

chain.name: Pixies' Cloud Pieces
procedures: Talk to ???? once again.
Hunt for 30 Cloud Piece from Star Pixie, Lunar Pixie or Luster Pixie.
Head back to ???? and give her the collected item.

chain.name: The Sprayer Elma Borrowed 1
procedures: Talk to ???? once again.
Go to Orbis: Orbis Park and find Elma the Housekeeper.
Talk to her and you will obtain 1 Cloud Sprayer.

chain.name: The Sprayer Elma Borrowed 2
procedures: Return to ???? and give her the Cloud Sprayer.

chain.name: Lisa's Special Medicine I
procedures: Talk to Moppie in Orbis.
Talk to Lisa in Orbis.

chain.name: Lisa's Special Medicine II
rewards: Scroll for Pet Equip. for Speed 60% x 1
procedures: Talk to Lisa in Orbis.
Hunt for 40 Orange Potion.
Hunt for 20 Blue Potion.
Hunt for 1 Antidote.
Hunt for 1 Fierry's Tentacle.
Return to Lisa and give her all the collected items.

chain.name: Lisa's Special Medicine III
procedures: Return to Moppie in Orbis with the collected item and talk to him.

chain.name: Food-Hunting for Moppie I
procedures: Find Huckle who is located at Orbis: Orbis Tower <Hidden Room>.
Hunt for 100 Jr. Pepe's Fish.
Go to Moppie and pass him the item.

chain.name: Food-Hunting for Moppie II
procedures: Find Huckle who is located at Orbis: Orbis Tower <Hidden Room>.
Hunt for 200 Jr. Pepe's Fish.
Go to Moppie and pass him the item.

chain.name: Food-Hunting for Moppie III
rewards: Scroll for Shoes for Speed 60% x 1
procedures: Find Huckle who is located at Orbis: Orbis Tower <Hidden Room>.
Hunt for 300 Jr. Pepe's Fish.
Go to Moppie and pass him the item.

chain.name: Moppie the Lone Dawg
procedures: Find Moppie in Orbis.
Next, talk to Lisa and you will initiate the next quest, Fairy's Horn Flute.

chain.name: Delivering Food to Spiruna
rewards: This quest is available to all levels over 30.
procedures: Talk to Kriel the Fairy  in Orbis.
Purchase 20 Apple, 20 Egg and 20 Orange from Edel the Fairy.
Go to Old Man's House in Orbis: Cloud Park IV and talk to ????.

chain.name: Collecting Huckle's Magic Ingredients
procedures: Enter Orbis: Orbis Tower <Hidden Room> through a portal in the middle of the Orbis: Orbis Tower <10th Floor> and talk to Huckle.
Collect 45 Jr. Sentinel Shellpiece from Jr. Sentinel.
Collect 20 Ice Sentinel Shellpiece from Ice Sentinel.
Collect 20 Fire Sentinel Shellpiece from Fire Sentinel.
Return to Huckle and pass the collected items to him.

chain.name: Kenta's Advice
procedures: Talk to Kenta in Aquarium: Zoo.

Hit the boxes found around Aqua Road until you obtain:

1 Piece of Paper A
1 Piece of Paper B
1 Piece of Paper C
1 Piece of Paper D
1 Piece of Paper E
1 Piece of Paper A
1 Piece of Paper B
1 Piece of Paper C
1 Piece of Paper D
1 Piece of Paper E
Return to Kenta after you have collected all the items.
